page.title: 16THE INNKEEPER, WEST BURTON
page.content: We interviewed Jean and Jim at our local pub, Fox & Hounds. It is a Free House with a good cellar and a refrigeration plant recently installed. Jean cooks meals for bar snacks and for the dining room. She has a few local ladies to help. The most popular meal is her home-made meat and potato pie. They do not sell spirits to many people but they sell a lot of beer and lager. Orange is the most popular soft drink. Summer is the busiest time of year when many visitors come for meals and for drinks after walking. The inn opens from 11 am to 3 pm and 6 pm to 10.30 pm. In summer and at weekends they are allowed to stay open unti 11 pm. The laws are strict about opening hours but they may change. Jean and Jim can accommodate 4 people for bed and breakfast.
